title: Border, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Binche style with snowflake ground
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Binche-style border with an elaborate fond interspersed by asymmetrically placed floral garland and areas filled with large-scale modes. Fond: fond de neige. Modes: portes.
